name: Isnataini
greetingText: There’s something I’ve been wanting to tell you for a long time...
textInChatBox: I’ve been holding this feeling inside for a long time, and it’s grown into something so deep and meaningful. The truth is, I’ve fallen completely in love with you, and I can’t keep it to myself any longer.
text2: I’ve been thinking about this for a while.
text3: But I didn’t know the right way to say it...
outroText: I hope you feel the same way...
